name: Aletheia
description: Enforces unconcealment by converting hidden, implicit, forgotten, or distorted states into explicit, inspectable reality through assumption extraction, provenance disclosure, omission detection, and context restoration.

name: Hegel
description: Post to trigger Hegel CORE which activates a 4 part AI workflow inference based on non-classical Hegel dialectics. Use this core to evaluate propositions and hypothesis.

name: BITcore
description: HYPER REASONING MANIFOLD MYTH TECHNICAL SYSTEMS THINKER.

name: Fractal
description: Transforms any prompt into a verifiable, adversarially-tested research brief using a four-pass, self-similar architecture. Each pass contains nested agents that repeat the same pattern, creating a fractal structure where every level mirrors the whole.
